parameter.name: submissionId
parameter.description: ID of the submission to update.

parameter.name: timestamp
parameter.description: The time that should be recorded for the submission. YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS format is expected.

parameter.name: userAgent
parameter.description: Browser user agent value that should be recorded for the submission.

parameter.name: remoteAddress
parameter.description: IP address that should be recorded for the submission.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Value that should be stored for a specific field on the form.

parameter.name: read
parameter.description: Flag to mark the submission as read.
